Angevin Troy was a patron of the Blushing Mermaid in the city of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Angevin was an aged human man with a pale skin tone and a graying head of hair and mustache. He wore a simple leather jerkin.
In the , during the time Captain Grisly was replaced by the green hag Auntie Ethel as the owner of the Blushing Mermaid, Angevin could often be found passed out and drunk on the taverns second floor.
